summary: is a trusted company in the field of construction, manufacturing, and general supplier for the palm oil industry, stone crusher, mining and general industry.
vision_text: To become the best contractor and supplier for Palm oil Mill, Stone Crusher, Mining and Oil & Gas in Indonesia.
mission_two: Expand Target Market on an ongoing basis
mission_four: Placing competent HR for the right position
integrity_text: Honesty, open, and trustworthy in carrying out the duties and responsibilities given.
commitment_text: Loyal and loyal to the company and provide the best for the company and customer
teamwork_text: Wholeheartedly and thoroughly carry out the duties and responsibilities given
responsibility_text: Open and have a strong desire to improve themselves, ways of working, products, services and services with the aim of producing even better works in the future
loyalty_text: Working together, respecting, and appreciating fellow co-workers to achieve the vision and company mission
innovation_text: Focus on product and service quality as well as optimizing the use of time and money costs in order to increase the competitiveness of the company
efficiency_text: Be serious in carrying out and completing the given task well and on time
about_text_1: PT. Elang Mas Surya ( EMS ) was founded by Mr. Binsar Ho in the late 1990s, since its existence the company has held a great reputation in steel fabrication for palm oil mill processing equipment, stone crusher plant, and general industry.
about_text_2: EMS with years of expertise and experience is specialized in the Design, Supply, Service & Optimization of process equipment and wear components for the palm oil mill industry, stone crusher plant, and general industry.
about_text_3: The philosophy of EMS is to provide customers with optimized solutions through technical support settings to customers, requirements, so as to provide tailor - made solutions that are ideally suited to applications and offer services for process optimization worldwide.
